contest-event.event-date:
April 5, 1992 D Pogson Bray (Section B)
Pogson Bray (Section B) 20 Test Piece Contest Pogson Bray pogson-bray-section-b
March & Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Town Hall, Dewsbury, West Yorkshire Prizes - 1st £150 and trophy, 2nd £100, 3rd £75, 4th £60, best section 4 band not in prizes £50, best march(Skelmanthorpe) trophy only, best soloist M.Beaurain (Skelmasnthorpe) £20. 6 bands competed.
Aug. 31, 2014, 10:14 a.m. March 19, 2017, 3:07 p.m.
1 Skelmanthorpe Band Stuart Fawcett
2 Marsden Silver Prize Band Jim Hunter
3 Linthwaite Silver Band David Pogson
4 Knottingley Silver Band Steve Platten
Unknown Result Crofton Silver Band Brian Nicholson
Unknown Result Gawthorpe Brass 85 Sandy Smith
